name: The Legend of Zelda: LTTP World Map VR
name_original: The Legend of Zelda: LTTP World Map VR
description:
Experience Hyrule (the world overture we're all a little too familiar with from our childhoods, courtesy of The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past) from the perspective of Link... Or scale yourself up and explore the entirety from a giant's view. It's all up to you.

Disclaimer: This project is not affiliated or endorsed by Nintendo and is being released for free (non-commercial) for fans of the game.

Controls:

  • Right trigger: Scale up
  • Left trigger: Scale down
  • Touchpad (both controllers): Teleport
  • Menu: DOES NOTHING

Model created for Game of Hyrule's opening, modeled by Megasteakman.

Assets used:

  • VRTK - Virtual Reality Toolkit
  • UBER - Standard Shader Ultra
  • Volumetric Fog & Mist
  • Scion - Filmic Post Processing
  • SSAO Pro

For more on the making of, and behind the scenes, visit our blog!

If you don't have a Vive, but still want to check it out, try out our WASD version here! It's definitely not perfect, but it's something! Use 'Q' and 'E' to change your scale.
